PH030 - An Exposure of Fanaticism and Wickedness (1885)


       Written Statement from Sister White. 

                 South Lancaster, Mass., Aug. 7, 1885. 


     I am compelled to state that I have not had the least faith in Mr. Garmire or his work. The pamphlet that was issued last fall at the time of our Jackson camp-meeting had not the least sanction of our people. They were sent broadcast by stealing the Review and Herald list.
